The defence of militarie profession Wherein is eloquently shewed the due commendation of martiall prowesse, and plainly prooued how necessary the exercise of armes is for this our age. Gates, Geffrey.
63, [1] p.
By Henry Middleton, for Iohn Harison, Imprinted at London : 1579.
Dedication signed: Geffrey Gates. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
